field.label: vpnapi (API key optional)
field.help: vpnapi.io allows 100 requests per day without an API key

field.label: vpnapi API key
field.help: Increases daily limit from 100 to 1,000 requests. Get a free API key at https://vpnapi.io/signup

field.label: proxycheck (API key optional)
field.help: proxycheck.io allows 100 requests per day without an API key

field.label: proxycheck API key
field.help: Increases daily limit from 100 to 1,000 requests. Get a free API key at https://proxycheck.io/dashboard/

field.label: ip2location (API key optional)
field.help: ip2location allows 20 requests per day without an API key

field.label: ip2location API key
field.help: Key grants 5,000 credits. Get a free API key at https://ip2location.com/register?id=1005

field.label: ip2proxy (API key optional)
field.help: ip2proxy allows 50 requests TOTAL without an API key

field.label: ip2proxy API key
field.help: Key grants 5,000 credits. Get a free API key at https://www.ip2location.com/web-service/ip2proxy

field.label: ipqualityscore (API key required)
field.help: ipqualityscore.com allows 5,000 requsts per month with a free API key

field.label: ipqualityscore API key
field.help: Get a free API key at https://www.ipqualityscore.com/

field.label: ipblacklist.ai (API key required)
field.help: Allows 1,000 requsts per day with a free API key

field.label: IpBlacklist API key
field.help: Get a free API key at https://ipblacklist.ai/

field.label: scamalytics (API key required)
field.help: Allows 5,000 requsts per month with a free API key

field.label: Scamalytics API username
field.help: Get a free API key at https://scamalytics.com/ip/api/enquiry

field.label: Scamalytics API key
field.help: Get a free API key at https://scamalytics.com/ip/api/enquiry

field.label: ipvoid (API key required)
field.help: Allows 25 credits (~310 requests) with a free API key

field.label: onionoo TOR directory
field.help: TOR relay directory API - unlimited requests
